summary: Enjoy armor perks even when only wearing 3 pieces. Now you can both see your character's face and get the armor perks too
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Green][size=7]Helmless Warrior Reworked[/size][/color][/center][center][color=Green][size=4]by Madcow[/size][/color][/center]
[color=Green][size=3]Version :[/size][/color]1.0
[color=Green][size=3]Date :[/size][/color]5/26/2014
[color=Green][size=3]Category :[/size][/color]Gameplay Effects and Changes

[u][center][size=5][color=Green]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u]
This is a rework of Adul's Helmless Warrior found here (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8131/?)

[u][center][size=5][color=Green]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u]
This is a rework of Adul's Helmless Warrior which enables armor perks even if you wear only 3 pieces (vs Vanilla requires 4). In the previous version, the Matching Set perk did not apply to Ebony armor, Tower of Strength had been untouched, and support for DLC was missing. Keywords for DLC armors has been included, which means you must have the DLC to use this.

The following perks were adjusted:
Cushioned, Custom Fit, Deft Movement, Matching Set (Heavy Armor),
Matching Set (Light Armor), Reflect Blows, Tower of Strenght, Well Fitted, Wind Walker


Also try out my other mod:
Convert Your Armor - Balanced Transmogrification (www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54277/?)
Madcow's Race Enhancement (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54422/?)


[u][center][size=5][color=Green]Credits[/color][/size][/center][/u]
All credits to original author, Adul
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8131/?

[u][center][size=5][color=Green]Manual Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u]
Download and unzip into your Data folder

[u][center][size=5][color=Green]Mod Dependencies[/color][/size][/center][/u]
MUST HAVE DLCs. A no DLC version will be released on request.
